description: Thanks Katia for being extremely Collaborative with me and Territory Implementation. You have always been quick in understanding the requirement and provide us with speedy and brilliant solutions. I would like to shout out for your superb collaboration with us and looking forward to a more wonderful journey with you and IS going ahead.

Benny has been exceptional in transforming his ideas into real world implementations. His contribution towards creation of the Template extension has got some really good feedbacks and has been greatly appreciated. Not limited to this, he has been showing full zeal in contributing towards other initiatives as well. Would like to appreciate Benny towards his quality of empowering the Team with the much need tools to focus on efficiency and quality.

I would like to appreciate the way Roshan properly documents all the cases that are escalated to Custom Team, with all the steps and checks that the custom team follows. It has greatly helped us in decreasing the escalations to custom. Thanks for imparting and enhancing our knowledge.
Just want to give a shout out to Benny , Vivek and Arun for being always so collaborative and making this work from home fun .

Since the day Rohit got promoted, I can see him working very aggressively towards achieving his goals and always striving to be better at what he is doing. I want to appreciate Rohit for his positive attitude towards learning new things.

Roshan is very versatile with his deliverables. His discipline and commitment towards his work is unquestionable. 
He is a great team player and has a very positive mindset. He always ensures his deliveries within the given timelines and with complete dedication. 
I want to appreciate Roshan for being such a crucial team player and being able to exhibit these qualities consistently.
Guarav is the wild card of our team. He prefers to be quiet and deliver extra ordinary stuffs. His capability to deliver under pressure situations and short deadlines makes him special.

Since the day Chirag has joined Spirit Committee, he has been a great support pillar to the team. His commitment and efforts are worth appreciating. I want to thank him for always being on top for any kind of help and proving the real meaning of being a Team Player.

Hi,

I want to appreciate your efforts for being an expert.

This is test shoutout.

Collaborative thinking is probably one of the most important competency one has to have and it is even more important that leaders are able to develop the similar mindset in their team members. I vividly remember my visit to London office last year and the challenges people in different business teams was facing while working the TI team. We have walked a long way together solving each of those challenges and taking our relationship to new heights every day. It was possible because of Arthur and his team's positive outlook for TI and Working with Arthur and his team is always a pleasure. Thank you Arthur!
Amazing
Thank you for being out Batman <3

message: Improving quality (anything from processes to life at Taboola)
description: Eloise, thanks so much for your hard work on this peer-to-peer recognition and gratitude program - I am very excited about this Taboola Inspire project now live!

Poonam has improved greatly in terms of handling customers and being an expert in the Taboola News front. She has also shown great initiation with the India Spirit Committee. Unfortunately, the form only allows me to select one quality. She has great potential, and her hard-work and professionalism is worth mentioning.
Patient / Resilient / Positive

Simon, thank you so much for the tremendous work you've been doing for the UK Pub Enterprise this year. Your ability to step into calls and offer your technical support and knowledge, the speed by which you execute and the quality of your work are inspirational to the team and everyone knows they can trust you blindly when you deliver a task.

It's a pleasure working alongside you, so just wanted to say Thank You for dealing with all our obscene and urgent requests in such a manner and contributing to our revenues and relationship with our partners.

Maayan is really good in Collaboration, bringing new ideas/innovations to the projects. She is very supportive & a very good listener. She is always available.
Thank You Maayan & Lee :)

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

Thanks for your continued support in reviewing campaigns at super-speed and therefore supporting us as AMs! You are always available, always give helpful advice to pass back to our clients and always promptly react to our 10000 gchats and cases! THANK YOU!

message: Generally being a great person to work with
description: It is a pleasure to come to work every day with people like you in the team ! :)
